summary.span: 代表 8 位元不帶正負號的整數。

span.span: Represents an 8-bit unsigned integer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不可變的實值型別代表不帶正負號的整數值，範圍從 0 (代表常數) 到 255 之間 (表示常數)。 is an immutable value type that represents unsigned integers with values that range from 0 (which is represented by the constant) to 255 (which is represented by the constant). .NET Framework 也包含帶正負號的 8 位元整數值的型別， ，代表範圍從-128 到 127 的值。The .NET Framework also includes a signed 8-bit integer value type, , which represents values that range from -128 to 127. ## 具現化的位元組值Instantiating a Byte Value 您可以具現化值以數種方式：You can instantiate a value in several ways: - 您可以宣告變數並將其指派的範圍內的常值的整數值資料型別。You can declare a variable and assign it a literal integer value that is within the range of the data type. 下列範例會宣告兩個變數並將它們指派這種方式的值。The following example declares two variables and assigns them values in this way. [!code-csharp[System.Byte.Instantiation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.byte.instantiation/cs/byteinstantiation1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Byte.Instantiation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.byte.instantiation/vb/byteinstantiate1.vb#1)] - 您可以將非位元組數字的值指派給一個位元組。You can assign a non-byte numeric value to a byte. 這是縮小轉換，因此如果需要轉換運算子，在 C# 和 Visual Basic 中的轉換方法`Option Strict`上。This is a narrowing conversion, so it requires a cast operator in C# and a conversion method in Visual Basic if `Option Strict` is on. 非位元組值是否， ，或包含小數部分，而它的小數部分的處理的值取決於編譯器執行轉換。If the non-byte value is a , , or value that includes a fractional component, the handling of its fractional part depends on the compiler performing the conversion. 下列範例會指派數個數值的值給變數。The following example assigns several numeric values to variables. [!code-csharp[System.Byte.Instantiation#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.byte.instantiation/cs/byteinstantiation1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Byte.Instantiation#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.byte.instantiation/vb/byteinstantiate1.vb#2)] - 您可以呼叫的方法類別，以轉換任何支援的型別值。You can call a method of the class to convert any supported type to a value. 這可能是因為支援介面。This is possible because supports the interface. 下列範例說明轉換的一連串值來值。The following example illustrates the conversion of an array of values to values. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ToByte#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.tobyte/cs/tobyte1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ToByte#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.tobyte/vb/tobyte1.vb#4)] - 您可以呼叫或是方法，將轉換的字串表示法值。You can call the or method to convert the string representation of a value to a . 字串可以包含十進位或十六進位的數字。The string can contain either decimal or hexadecimal digits. 下列範例說明使用十進位和十六進位字串的剖析作業。The following example illustrates the parse operation by using both a decimal and a hexadecimal string. [!code-csharp[System.Byte.Instantiation#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.byte.instantiation/cs/byteinstantiation1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Byte.Instantiation#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.byte.instantiation/vb/byteinstantiate1.vb#3)] ## 位元組值上執行的作業Performing Operations on Byte Values 類型支援標準的數學運算，例如加法、 減法、 部門、 乘法、 減法、 負號、 和一元否定運算。The type supports standard mathematical operations such as addition, subtraction, division, multiplication, subtraction, negation, and unary negation. 像其他整數類資料類型，類型也支援位元`AND`， `OR`， `XOR`，左 shift 鍵和向右移位運算子。Like the other integral types, the type also supports the bitwise `AND`, `OR`, `XOR`, left shift, and right shift operators. 您可以使用標準數值運算子比較兩個值，或您可以呼叫或方法。You can use the standard numeric operators to compare two values, or you can call the or method. 您也可以呼叫的成員類別來執行各種不同的數字的作業，包括取得數值的絕對值，計算商數和餘數整數除法運算，判斷兩個最大或最小值整數，取得數字符號和捨入數字。You can also call the members of the class to perform a wide range of numeric operations, including getting the absolute value of a number, calculating the quotient and remainder from integral division, determining the maximum or minimum value of two integers, getting the sign of a number, and rounding a number. ## 表示為字串的位元組Representing a Byte as a String 型別提供完整支援標準和自訂數值格式字串。The type provides full support for standard and custom numeric format strings. (如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)，[標準數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)，並[自訂數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。)不過，大多數情況下，位元組值會表示為到三位數的個位數的值沒有任何其他格式，或做為兩位數十六進位值。(For more information, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md), [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md), and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md).) However, most commonly, byte values are represented as one-digit to three-digit values without any additional formatting, or as two-digit hexadecimal values. 若要格式化值為沒有前置零的整數類資料字串，您可以呼叫無參數方法。To format a value as an integral string with no leading zeros, you can call the parameterless method. 藉由使用"D"格式規範，您也可以包含指定之字串表示法中的前置零的數目。By using the "D" format specifier, you can also include a specified number of leading zeros in the string representation. 您可以藉由使用"X"格式規範，表示做為十六進位字串的值。By using the "X" format specifier, you can represent a value as a hexadecimal string. 下列範例會格式化的陣列中的項目下列三種方式中的值。The following example formats the elements in an array of values in these three ways. [!code-csharp[System.Byte.Formatting#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.byte.formatting/cs/formatting1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Byte.Formatting#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.byte.formatting/vb/formatting1.vb#1)] 您也可以格式化值為二進位，八進位、 十進位或十六進位的字串，藉由呼叫方法並提供方法的第二個參數的基底。You can also format a value as a binary, octal, decimal, or hexadecimal string by calling the method and supplying the base as the method's second parameter. 下列範例會呼叫此方法，以顯示二進位、 八進位和十六進位表示的位元組值陣列。The following example calls this method to display the binary, octal, and hexadecimal representations of an array of byte values. [!code-csharp[System.Byte.Formatting#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.byte.formatting/cs/formatting1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Byte.Formatting#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.byte.formatting/vb/formatting1.vb#2)] ## 使用非十進位位元組值Working with Non-Decimal Byte Values 除了使用個別的位元組，做為十進位值，您可能想要執行位元運算位元組的值，或使用位元組陣列或使用位元組值的二進位或十六進位表示。In addition to working with individual bytes as decimal values, you may want to perform bitwise operations with byte values, or work with byte arrays or with the binary or hexadecimal representations of byte values. 比方說，多載方法可以將每一種基本資料類型轉換成位元組陣列，而方法將至位元組陣列的值。For example, overloads of the method can convert each of the primitive data types to a byte array, and the method converts a value to a byte array. 值中的 8 位元來表示其大小，沒有正負號位元。 values are represented in 8 bits by their magnitude only, without a sign bit. 這很重要要牢記在心，當您在上執行位元運算值，或當您使用個別位元。This is important to keep in mind when you perform bitwise operations on values or when you work with individual bits. 若要執行的數字、 布林值或在任何兩個非十進位值的比較作業，這兩個值都必須使用相同的表示法。In order to perform a numeric, Boolean, or comparison operation on any two non-decimal values, both values must use the same representation. 當作業在兩個值、 值共用相同的表示法，因此結果正確無誤。When an operation is performed on two values, the values share the same representation, so the result is accurate. 這說明在下列的範例中，並同時隱蔽的最低順序位元值，以確保它是偶數。This is illustrated in the following example, which masks the lowest-order bit of a value to ensure that it is even. [!code-csharp[System.Byte.Bitwise#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.byte.bitwise/cs/bitwise1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Byte.Bitwise#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.byte.bitwise/vb/bitwise1.vb#1)] 相反地，當您使用不帶正負號和帶正負號位元時，位元運算複雜，原因，值能用於正數值及二補數表示負值的標誌大小表示.On the other hand, when you work with both unsigned and signed bits, bitwise operations are complicated by the fact that the values use sign-and-magnitude representation for positive values, and two's complement representation for negative values. 若要執行有意義的位元運算，值必須可轉換成兩個對等的表示法，並必須保留正負號位元的相關資訊。In order to perform a meaningful bitwise operation, the values must be converted to two equivalent representations, and information about the sign bit must be preserved. 下列範例中這麼做是以 out 2 和 4 的 8 位元帶正負號和不帶正負號的值陣列的位元遮罩。The following example does this to mask out bits 2 and 4 of an array of 8-bit signed and unsigned values. [!code-csharp[System.Byte.Bitwise#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.byte.bitwise/cs/bitwise2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Byte.Bitwise#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.byte.bitwise/vb/bitwise2.vb#2)]

span.span: As with any other type, reading and writing to a shared variable that contains an instance of this type must be protected by a lock to guarantee thread safety.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會實作介面並執行稍微優於方法因為並沒有將`value`物件的參數。This method implements the interface and performs slightly better than the method because it does not have to convert the `value` parameter to an object. 根據您的程式語言，可能是程式碼可能方法的參數類型具有較少的位元的位置 （較窄） 與執行個體類型。Depending on your programming language, it might be possible to code a method where the parameter type has fewer bits (is narrower) than the instance type. 這可能是因為有些程式語言會執行隱含的擴展轉換，將參數表示為型別具有相同位元數與執行個體。This is possible because some programming languages perform an implicit widening conversion that represents the parameter as a type with as many bits as the instance. 例如，假設此執行個體類型是，且參數類型為。For example, suppose the instance type is and the parameter type is . Microsoft C# 編譯器會產生代表做為參數的值的指示，然後產生比較的值的方法執行個體和參數表示法。The Microsoft C# compiler generates instructions to represent the value of the parameter as an , then generates a method that compares the values of the instance and the parameter representation. 請參閱您的程式語言的文件，以判斷其編譯器是否會執行隱含的擴展轉換數值類型上。Consult your programming language's documentation to determine whether its compiler performs implicit widening conversions on numeric types. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範泛型和非泛型版本`CompareTo`數的值和參考類型的方法。The following code example demonstrates generic and non-generic versions of the `CompareTo` method for several value and reference types. [!code-cpp[T.CompareTo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/T.CompareTo/CPP/cat.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[T.CompareTo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/T.CompareTo/CS/cat.cs#1)] [!code-vb[T.CompareTo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/T.CompareTo/VB/cat.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `s`參數會包含數字的格式：The `s` parameter contains a number of the form: [ws][簽署] 數字 [ws][ws][sign]digits[ws] 在方括號 ([ 和 ]) 中的項目是選擇性的項目。Elements in square brackets ([ and ]) are optional. 下表說明每個元素。The following table describes each element. |元素Element|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |*ws**ws*|選擇性的泛空白字元。Optional white space.| |*簽署**sign*|選擇性正或負號。An optional positive or negative sign.| |*digits**digits*|範圍從 0 到 9 的數字順序。A sequence of digits ranging from 0 to 9.| `s`參數會解譯使用樣式。The `s` parameter is interpreted using the style. 位元組值的十進位數字，除了只允許前置和尾端空格，以及前置正負號。In addition to the byte value's decimal digits, only leading and trailing spaces together with a leading sign are allowed. (如果符號，它必須是正號或方法會擲回。)若要明確地定義中可以存在的樣式項目`s`，使用任何一種或方法。(If the sign is present, it must be a positive sign or the method throws an .) To explicitly define the style elements that can be present in `s`, use either the or the method. `s`參數會剖析使用的格式設定資訊中初始化目前系統文化特性的物件。The `s` parameter is parsed using the formatting information in a object that is initialized for the current system culture. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 若要剖析的字串時使用其他文化特性格式資訊，請使用方法。To parse a string using the formatting information of some other culture, use the method. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將字串值轉換成位元組的值使用方法。The following example demonstrates how to convert a string value into a byte value using the method. 產生的位元組值接著會顯示在主控台中。The resulting byte value is then displayed to the console. remarks.format: ## Remarks `style`參數定義中允許的樣式項目 （例如空格或正號）`s`剖析作業成功的參數。The `style` parameter defines the style elements (such as white space or the positive sign) that are allowed in the `s` parameter for the parse operation to succeed. 它必須是從位元旗標的組合列舉型別。It must be a combination of bit flags from the enumeration. 值而定`style`，則`s`參數可能包括下列項目：Depending on the value of `style`, the `s` parameter may include the following elements: [ws][$][sign]digits[.fractional_digits][e[sign]digits][ws][ws][$][sign]digits[.fractional_digits][e[sign]digits][ws] 或者，如果`style`包含:Or, if `style` includes : [ws] hexdigits [ws][ws]hexdigits[ws] 在方括號 ([ 和 ]) 中的項目是選擇性的項目。Elements in square brackets ([ and ]) are optional. 下表說明每個元素。The following table describes each element. |元素Element|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |*ws**ws*|選擇性的泛空白字元。Optional white space. 空白字元可以出現在開頭`s`如果`style`包含旗標，或在 s 如果樣式包含結尾旗標。White space can appear at the beginning of `s` if `style` includes the flag, or at the end of s if style includes the flag.| |*$*|特定文化特性的貨幣符號。A culture-specific currency symbol. 在字串中的位置由定義目前文化特性的屬性。Its position in the string is defined by the property of the current culture. 目前的文化特性的貨幣符號會出現在`s`如果`style`包含旗標。The current culture's currency symbol can appear in `s` if `style` includes the flag.| |*簽署**sign*|選擇性的正號。An optional positive sign. (此方法會擲回負號是否存在於`s`。)符號可以出現在開頭`s`如果`style`包含旗標，或在結尾`s`如果`style`包含旗標。(The method throws an if a negative sign is present in `s`.) The sign can appear at the beginning of `s` if `style` includes the flag, or at the end of `s` if `style` includes the flag.| |*digits**digits*|從 0 到 9 的數字序列。A sequence of digits from 0 through 9.| |*.**.*|特定文化特性的貨幣符號。A culture-specific decimal point symbol. 目前的文化特性的貨幣符號會出現在`s`如果`style`包含旗標。The current culture's decimal point symbol can appear in `s` if `style` includes the flag.| |*fractional_digits**fractional_digits*|數字 0 的一或多個項目。One or more occurrences of the digit 0. 小數點後數字可以出現在`s`只有當`style`包含旗標。Fractional digits can appear in `s` only if `style` includes the flag.| |*e**e*|E 或 E 字元，表示代表的值時，會以指數標記法。The e or E character, which indicates that the value is represented in exponential notation. `s`參數可代表指數標記法之數字，如果`style`包含旗標。The `s` parameter can represent a number in exponential notation if `style` includes the flag.| |*hexdigits**hexdigits*|一連串的從 0 到 f 或 0 到 f 的十六進位數字A sequence of hexadecimal digits from 0 through f, or 0 through F.| > [!NOTE] > 中的任何終止 NUL (u+0000) 字元`s`剖析作業中，不論值會忽略`style`引數。Any terminating NUL (U+0000) characters in `s` are ignored by the parsing operation, regardless of the value of the `style` argument. 十進位數字的字串 (對應至樣式) 一律會成功剖析。A string with decimal digits only (which corresponds to the style) always parses successfully. 大部分的其餘成員控制可能，但不是一定要出現在此輸入字串的項目。Most of the remaining members control elements that may be but are not (列舉會包含複合的數字樣式，其中包含這兩個空白字元旗標。)(The enumeration includes a composite number style, , that includes both white space flags.) `s`參數會剖析使用的格式設定資訊中初始化目前系統文化特性的物件。The `s` parameter is parsed using the formatting information in a object that is initialized for the current system culture. 若要使用其他文化特性格式資訊，請呼叫多載。To use the formatting information of some other culture, call the overload. ## Examples 下列範例會剖析的字串表示法`Byte`值與方法。The following example parses string representations of `Byte` values with the method. 目前的文化特性的範例中是 EN-US。The current culture for the example is en-US. summary.span: 將目前 物件的值，轉換為其相等的字串表示。

span.span: The string representation of the value of this object, which consists of a sequence of digits that range from 0 to 9 with no leading zeroes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回的值會以一般的數值格式規範格式化 ("G") 和執行緒目前的文化特性的物件。The return value is formatted with the general numeric format specifier ("G") and the object for the thread current culture. 若要定義的格式化值的字串表示法中，呼叫方法。To define the formatting of the value's string representation, call the method. 若要定義的格式規範與用來建立的字串表示的文化特性值，請呼叫方法。To define both the format specifiers and culture used to create the string representation of a value, call the method. .NET Framework 會提供廣泛的格式化支援，這會在下列格式化主題中的更詳細地說明：The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics: - 如需有關數值格式規範的詳細資訊，請參閱[標準數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)並[自訂數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md). - 如需有關格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). 執行緒目前文化特性的相關資訊，請參閱。For information about the thread current culture, see . ## Examples 下列範例會顯示位元組值的陣列。The following example displays an array of byte values. 請注意，方法未明確呼叫在範例中。Note that the method is not called explicitly in the example. 相反地，它是以隱含方式呼叫，因為使用了[複合格式](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md)功能。Instead, it is called implicitly, because of the use of the [composite formatting](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md) feature. remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回值是以一般的數值格式規範 ("G") 格式。The return value is formatted with the general numeric format specifier ("G"). `provider`參數是該物件會實作介面。The `provider` parameter is an object that implements the interface. 其方法會傳回物件，提供特定文化特性格式資訊由這個方法傳回的字串。Its method returns a object that provides culture-specific information about the format of the string that is returned by this method. 實作的物件可以是下列任一項：The object that implements can be any of the following: - A物件，表示要使用之格式化規則所屬的文化特性。A object that represents the culture whose formatting rules are to be used. - A包含特定數字的格式資訊，此值的物件。A object that contains specific numeric formatting information for this value. - 自訂物件實作。A custom object that implements . 如果`provider`已`null`或無法取得物件，從`provider`，傳回值的格式使用執行緒目前的文化特性的物件。If `provider` is `null` or a object cannot be obtained from `provider`, the return value is formatted using the object for the thread current culture. 執行緒目前文化特性的相關資訊，請參閱。For information about the thread current culture, see . .NET Framework 會提供廣泛的格式化支援，這會在下列格式化主題中的更詳細地說明：The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics: - 如需有關數值格式規範的詳細資訊，請參閱[標準數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)並[自訂數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md). - 如需有關格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). ## Examples 下列範例會逐一查看的位元組陣列值，並且顯示每個主控台，藉由呼叫以不同的格式提供者的方法。The following example iterates an array of byte values and displays each of them to the console by calling the method with different format providers. remarks.format: ## Remarks 轉換失敗，而且此方法會傳回`false`如果`s`參數不是正確的格式，它是否`null`或，或如果它代表一個數字小於或大於。The conversion fails and the method returns `false` if the `s` parameter is not in the correct format, if it is `null` or , or if it represents a number less than or greater than . 方法是類似方法，不同之處在於如果轉換失敗，沒有擲回例外狀況。The method is similar to the method, except that does not throw an exception if the conversion fails. `s`參數應該是下列格式之數字的字串表示：The `s` parameter should be the string representation of a number in the following form: ``` [ws][sign]digits[ws] ``` 在方括號 ([ 和 ]) 中的項目是選擇性的項目。Elements in square brackets ([ and ]) are optional. 下表說明每個元素。The following table describes each element. |元素Element|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |*ws**ws*|選擇性的泛空白字元。Optional white space.| |*簽署**sign*|選擇性的正號時，所指定目前文化特性的屬性。An optional positive sign, as specified by the property of the current culture.| |*digits**digits*|範圍從 0 到 9 的十進位數字的序列。A sequence of decimal digits that range from 0 to 9.| `s`參數會解譯使用樣式。The `s` parameter is interpreted using the style. 位元組值的十進位數字，除了只允許前置和尾端空格，以及前置正負號。In addition to the byte value's decimal digits, only leading and trailing spaces together with a leading sign are allowed. (如果符號，它必須是正號或方法會擲回。)若要明確定義的樣式項目，以及可出現在特定文化特性格式資訊`s`，使用方法。(If the sign is present, it must be a positive sign or the method throws an .) To explicitly define the style elements together with the culture-specific formatting information that can be present in `s`, use the method. `s`參數會剖析使用的格式設定資訊中目前的文化特性的物件。The `s` parameter is parsed using the formatting information in a object for the current culture. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 這個多載方法會解譯中的所有位數`s`參數做為十進位數字。This overload of the method interprets all digits in the `s` parameter as decimal digits. 若要剖析的十六進位數字的字串表示，呼叫多載。To parse the string representation of a hexadecimal number, call the overload. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫具有幾個不同字串值的方法。The following example calls the method with a number of different string values. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法就像是方法，除了方法不會擲回例外狀況如果轉換失敗。The method is like the method, except the method does not throw an exception if the conversion fails. `s`參數會使用的格式設定資訊中剖析提供的物件`provider`參數。The `s` parameter is parsed using the formatting information in a object supplied by the `provider` parameter. 樣式參數定義中允許的樣式項目 （例如空格或正號）`s`剖析作業成功的參數。The style parameter defines the style elements (such as white space or the positive sign) that are allowed in the `s` parameter for the parse operation to succeed. 它必須是從位元旗標的組合列舉型別。It must be a combination of bit flags from the enumeration. 值而定`style`，則`s`參數可能包括下列項目：Depending on the value of `style`, the `s` parameter may include the following elements: [ws][$][sign]digits[.fractional_digits][e[sign]digits][ws][ws][$][sign]digits[.fractional_digits][e[sign]digits][ws] 或者，如果`style`參數包含:Or, if the `style` parameter includes : [ws] hexdigits [ws][ws]hexdigits[ws] 在方括號 （[和]） 是選用項目。Elements in square brackets ( [ and ] ) are optional. 下表說明每個元素。The following table describes each element. |元素Element|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |*ws**ws*|選擇性的泛空白字元。Optional white space. 空白字元可以出現在開頭`s`如果`style`包含旗標，或在 s 如果樣式包含結尾旗標。White space can appear at the beginning of `s` if `style` includes the flag, or at the end of s if style includes the flag.| |*$*|特定文化特性的貨幣符號。A culture-specific currency symbol. 在字串中的位置由定義的屬性所傳回的物件方法`provider`參數。Its position in the string is defined by the property of the object returned by the method of the `provider` parameter. 貨幣符號會出現在`s`如果`style`包含旗標。The currency symbol can appear in `s` if `style` includes the flag.| |*簽署**sign*|選擇性的正號。An optional positive sign. (剖析作業失敗時，負號是否存在於`s`。)符號可以出現在開頭`s`如果`style`包含旗標，或在結尾`s`如果`style`包含旗標。(The parse operation fails if a negative sign is present in `s`.)
